articles.author: Sean Conlon, Pia Singh
articles.title: S&P 500 falls for a second day after AMD earnings, weak jobs data: Live updates - CNBC
articles.description: Tech put on the worst performance of the 11 sectors in the S&P 500, falling more than 2% on Tuesday.
articles.content:
The S&P 500 fell on Wednesday as traders continued to move out of technology stocks and digested the latest labor market data.
The broad market index dipped 0.2%, while Dow Jones Industrial Aver… [+2789 chars]

articles.title: So yeah, I vibe-coded a log colorizer—and I feel good about it - Ars Technica
articles.description: Some semi-unhinged musings on where LLMs fit into my life—and how I'll keep using them.
